bill_title: exempt from the state use tax the fair market value of goods given without charge.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to exempt from the state use tax the fair market value of goods given without charge. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That chapter 10-46 be amended with a NEW SECTION: The fair market value of all tangible personal property considered purchased for resale purposes, and given without charge to a customer during business operations, is exempt from the tax imposed by this chapter.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
